title: Riot Employees
body: I've had the privilege of playing against a couple of riot employees now and I have to give them props. Despite players occasionally eggin them on are trying to tilt them they have always kept there cool. Playing against riot blaustoise just 5 minutes ago he was camped out of his mind (something that would tilt most players), but he still had the courtesy to tell our mid laner good game. This was the case with the other two as well. Probs to them for being friendly.
